subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Allen Iverson made his Nuggets debut Friday night in a 101-96 loss to the Sacramento Kings and finished with 22 points and 10 assists in more than 39 minutes.
snippet: Allen Iverson made his Nuggets debut Friday night in a 101-96 loss to the Sacramento Kings and finished with 22 points and 10 assists in more than 39 minutes.
